00039 namespace omega 
00040 {
00044         typedef boost::format Format;
00045         // Define some macros to simplify string formatting and formatted logging
00046         #define ostr(format, args) boost::str(Format(format) args)
00047         #define ofmsg(format, args) omsg(ostr(format, args))
00048         #define oferror(format, args) oerror(ostr(format, args))
00049         #define ofwarn(format, args) owarn(ostr(format, args))
00050 
00051         typedef std::vector<String> StringVector;
